CustomField.description: Indicates that this OLI belongs to a draft order of an active opportunity. Used in the flow "Opportunity to Order".
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( Order.Opportunity.Contract_IsActive__c = True, ISPICKVAL(Order.Status, 'Draft'), Order.IsReductionOrder = False, OR( ISPICKVAL(Order.Opportunity.Type, 'New Business-Enterprise Cloud'), ISPICKVAL(Order.Opportunity.Type, 'Existing Business-Renewal'), ISPICKVAL(Order.Opportunity.Type, 'New Business - Expansion Portal'))), TRUE, FALSE)
CustomField.label: Is Draft Order of Active Opportunity?
